- <code class="New" type="1">New</code> <strong>Oracle Pro</strong> services now launched!! <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="New" type="1">New</code> <strong>Oracle V2</strong> services now launched!! <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> In <span class="uitext">Alert</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Event configuration</span>, changed the default value of the <span class="uitext">Inactive agent alert</span> option from 30 seconds to 1 minute. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> Changed to view before and after 30 minutes of the session execution time through the <span class="uitext">Session Details</span> window displayed when an item is selected in the <span class="uitext">Active Sessions</span> section in the following menu path, and the <span class="uitext">Analysis</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Session History</span> menu appears. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> In <span class="uitext">Dashboard</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Multi-instance Monitoring</span>, changed the names of some widgets. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="0">Changed</code> Changed the alternative guidance message of the XOS2 metrics in the <span class="uitext">Dashboard</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Instance list</span> menu to no longer appear. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> In <span class="uitext">Dashboard</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Instance Monitoring</span>, added the error handling feature to the object details window displayed when viewing a plan. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> Modified the following menu to display the database name in the option bar at the top of the screen. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> Changed the Full Scan section to be displayed in red in the <span class="text">SQL Details</span> window that appears when a query is selected to view the plan. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Feature" type="1">Feature</code> Added the <span class="uitext">Analysis</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Top SQL comparison</span> menu to compare SQL trends and check fluctuations over a set period based on the specific date. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="New" type="1">New</code> Altibase <code class="my">V2</code> services now launched! <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> In <span class="uitext">Management</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Project members</span>, modified not to invite the <a href="mailto:dbx@whatap.io" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">dbx@whatap.io</a> account together when using the <span class="uitext">Invite WhaTap Support Team</span> feature. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Feature" type="1">Feature</code> In <span class="uitext">Management</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Agent install</span>, added the feature to download agent files in ZIP format. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Feature" type="1">Feature</code> In <span class="uitext">Dashboard</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Multi-instance Monitoring</span>, added the custom widget to select metrics. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Feature" type="1">Feature</code> Added the feature to log user behaviors when the <span class="uitext">Session kill</span> feature is a success or failure. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="New" type="1">New</code> Added the <span class="uitext">Script manager</span> menu that can see the result by executing any SQL script. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_9_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.9.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="New" type="1">New</code> Launched the <strong>CUBRID</strong> <code class="my">V2</code> service. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_9_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.9.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> In <span class="uitext">Dashboard</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Monitoring Multiple Instances</span>, changed the <span class="uitext">time</span> column to display the time as the viewed time in the <span class="uitext">Vacuum history</span> window opened via the <img decoding="async" loading="lazy" alt="Details icon" src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," width="24" height="24" class="img_ev3q"></img> button of the <span class="uitext">Vacuum Sessions</span> widget. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_9_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.9.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> Added the support version in details of <strong>CUBRID</strong> and <strong>Altibase</strong> in the project creation screen. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_9_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.9.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Feature" type="1">Feature</code> In <span class="uitext">Dashboard</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Multi-instance Monitoring</span>, added the no merge option and guidance message to custom widgets upon entry. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_9_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.9.0​</code></a></code>

#### MySQL​

- <code class="Feature" type="1">Feature</code> In <span class="uitext">Management</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Agent install</span>, added the guidance message about roles. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_7_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.7.3​</code></a></code>

#### PostgreSQL / MySQL​

#### Oracle Pro​

- <code class="Feature" type="1">Feature</code> In <span class="uitext">Analysis</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Lock tree</span>, added the feature to display global locks when selecting a cluster. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> In <span class="uitext">Analysis</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Lock tree</span>, changed the maximum time range for selecting a cluster to view Global Lock information to 3 hours. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.2​</code></a></code>

#### Altibase​

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> Improved calling of the active session data. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

#### PostgreSQL​

- <code class='changelog-date'>2024-08-28</code> <code class='changelog-service'><a href="https://docs.whatap.io/en/release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><img src="../img/ic-link.svg" width="18px" height="18px" class="ico-link medium-zoom-image"></img> Service 2.8.0​</a></code> <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

#### Oracle V2, Oracle Pro​

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> In <span class="uitext">Dashboard</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">Multi-instance Monitoring</span>, changed to view the data of the <span class="uitext">Main Waits</span> widget in the <code>active_session</code> category. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

- <code class="Feature" type="1">Feature</code> Added the <span class="uitext">FILTER_PREDICATES</span> column in the <span class="uitext">Runtime Plan</span> and <span class="uitext">Explain Plan</span> tables of the <span class="uitext">SQL details</span> pop-up window. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_8_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.8.0​</code></a></code>

#### Oracle, Oracle Pro​

- <code class="Changed" type="1">Changed</code> In <span class="uitext">Analysis</span> &gt; <span class="uitext">SQL analysis</span>, changed the chart display format at the top of the screen. <code class='changelog-service'><a href="../release-notes/service/service-2_9_x"><code class='changelog-service'>Service 2.9.0​</code></a></code>
